pub async fn create_user_policy( client: &iamClient, user: &User, policy_name: &str, policy_document: &str, ) -> Result<(), iamError> { client .put_user_policy() .user_name(user.user_name.as_ref().unwrap()) .policy_name(policy_name) .policy_document(policy_document) .send() .await?;
Ok(()) }
